name: ContactPurpose
title: Contact Purpose Code System
publisher: HL7 Biopharmaceutical Regulatory Requirements (BRR) Work Group
description: Defines the role of a contact in regulatory correspondence. Used to distinguish the sender (health authority) and recipient (marketing authorization holder) in structured Q&A.

concept.definition: The contact represents the health authority issuing the regulatory questions (e.g., EMA, FDA).
The contact represents the sponsor or MAH responsible for responding to the questions.
The contact is copied on the correspondence for information purposes (optional).
An internal stakeholder (e.g., project lead, legal) involved in review but not primary sender/recipient.
